p: We obtained the updated data of the cumulative number of laboratory-confirmed 2019-nCov cases from the National Health Commission of the People’s Republic of China ( National Health Commission of the People’s Republic of China, 2020). The data information includes the cumulative confirmed cases, the cumulative number of deaths, newly confirmed cases and the cumulative number of cured cases, which are reported daily by the National Health Commission of the People’s Republic of China.
